protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the first and rate-limiting step in the kynurenine pathway of tryptophan catabolism.

reference.reference_text: Ball HJ, Sanchez-Perez A, Weiser S, Austin CJ, Astelbauer F, Miu J, McQuillan JA, Stocker R, Jermiin LS, Hunt NH: Characterization of an indoleamine 2,3-dioxygenase-like protein found in humans and mice. Gene. 2007 Jul 1;396(1):203-13. Epub 2007 Apr 18.
